_A_TABLE_GROUP_PAGINATION_DESCRIPTION_: The pagination can be configured with :pagination="{ use: true }".
_A_TABLE_GROUP_PAGINATION_DISABLED_DESCR: The pagination can be disabled with :pagination="{ use: true, disabled: true }".
_A_TABLE_GROUP_PAGINATION_LIMIT_DESCRIPT: The number of items per page can be set by using :pagination="{ use: true, limitsPerPage: ['5', '10', '25', '50', '100', '200'] }".
_A_TABLE_GROUP_PAGINATION_LIMIT_START_DE: The default number of items per page can be set by using :pagination="{ use: true, limitsPerPage: ['5', '10', '25', '50', '100', '200'], limitStart: 5 }".
_A_TABLE_GROUP_PAGINATION_LIMIT_START_HE: Default number of items per page
_A_TABLE_GROUP_PAGINATION_MAX_ITEMS_DESC: The maximum number of pages in the pagination can be set by using :pagination="{ use: true, maxPages: 7 }".
_A_TABLE_GROUP_PAGINATION_MAX_ITEMS_HEAD: Maximum number of pages in the pagination
_A_TABLE_GROUP_PAGINATION_OUTSIDE_DESCRI: The server-side pagination can be specified by using :pagination="{ use: true, isOutside: true }". The parameter :count-all-rows="999" specifies the total number of items in a table. Emit change-limit is called when changing the number of items per page. Emit change-offset is called when changing the pagination.
_A_TABLE_GROUP_PAGINATION_OUTSIDE_HEADER: Pagination outside of the component (server-side pagination)
